channel.title: Zombie Apocalypse BETA
channel.description:
zombie apocalypse not your average server.... zombies guns mayhem........ Ak47 and variants... lr300 and variants.. dragunov and variants...mp5 and variants.. colt 45 and variants.. uzi and variants... desert eagle.... tazer, MG42, A FLAMETHROWER!! Soon to be:grenade, airstrike. [img]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/9894/5u52.png[/img] [img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/3056/62510244.png[/img] [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/2093/69659404.png[/img]
put these in forum sigs etc, anywere possible! here are the codes:
1st [code]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/9894/5u52.png[/code]
2nd [code]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/3056/62510244.png[/code]
3rd [code]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/2093/69659404.png[/code]
Images thanks to Javafire Website at: [size=36pt]http://zapocalypse.x10.mx/[/size] Register, and find the client download for the beta! [size=36pt]http://zapocalypse.x10.mx/index.php?topic=5.0[/size] Official Client Download Thread ^^^^^ [img]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/408/approvalproof.png[/img] First off.... [size=36pt]this is completely based off Tatemo's Zombiescape.[/size] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,378544.0.html YES I HAVE PERMISSION FROM HIM TO START A DEV TEAM OFF THIS! [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/5623/proofpicturez.png[/img] POSITIONS! Owner Jrubrkletern (me) Administrators Carsten9 open Moderators open open Open Modeler(nothing big, very basic weapons w/color, and basic zombies) Reyx7 Coder PLayRooney
(Please note that all people on the team will have an moderator spot, unless you are a beta tester, if you just applied for moderator, then thats all you would do!)
Application format: Name: Age: Spot of interest: Why do you think you deserve this position?(If going for modeler, give me a sample of your work) How long have you been doing this position? Would you be dedicated? Some changes i have made..... added over 10 new zombie enemies fully coded (meaning hp, drops, damage, aggression, etc.) Zombie Headquarters (5 stages, 1 with a if you will, maze) Added over 100 more zombies (now they are in ardounge, camelot, more in falador, more in draynor, and more in lumbridge!) more spawns to come. THE ZOMBIE KNOWLEDGE DATABASE! Name:Zombie Lvl:15 Max hit:1 Aggressive? No Zombie Points for killing: 5 Hitpoints:45 [img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/6689/zombie1arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:38 Max hit:3 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:7 Hitpoints:95 [img]http://img529.imageshack.us/img529/6163/zombie2arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:58 Max hit:4 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:8 Hitpoints:115 [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/6795/zombie3arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:78 Max hit:5 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:135 [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/3542/zombie4arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:89 Max hit:6 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:165 [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/8741/zombie5arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:98 Max hit:8 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:11 Hitpoints:185 [img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/6703/zombie6arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:111 Max hit:10 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:12 Hitpoints:225 [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/4499/fghhi.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:138 Max hit:11 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:245 [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/4291/fgjfhmujg.png[/img]
Name:Zombie: Lvl:148 Max hit:13 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:275 [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/3167/gddfgdfg.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:168 Max hit:15 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:16 Hitpoints:315 [img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/1449/dfgdhsdjh.png[/img] Notice how this one is bigger than the others?
Now you may be thinking "Oh, ok, same looks, they just get stronger, anything else?" as they get stronger, they begin too....... "change...."
Name:Zombie Lvl:184 Max hit:18 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:19 Hitpoints:355 [img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/7874/hfghfjf.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:201 Max hit:22 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:21 Hitpoints:400 [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/5259/sfjsygherujhdszth.png[/img]
Name:Radiated Zombie Lvl:414 Max hit:25 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:25 Hitpoints:800 [img]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/3221/shdfhgf.png[/img]
Name:Alpha Zombie Lvl:???? Max hit:????? Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:100 Hitpoints:5000-25000 vary [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/4081/djhdgjdgf.png[/img]
[size=36pt]ZOMBIE HEADQUARTERS[/size] There are 5 rooms in the hq, each will have a challenge Room 1 (95% complete) Room 2 (90% complete) Room 3 (85% complete) Room 4 (complete) Room 5 (Complete) Video of the beta: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WiccI3aTHIk [size=36pt]ZOMBIE LEVELS[/size] now if you have not noticed already from the zombie pictures, there is a zombie level, no level 15 is not the highest because i have it, but it goes up to level 20, here is the complete table:
0-49 = level 0 50-99 = level 2 100-199 = level 3 200-399 = level 4 400-799 = level 5 800-1599 = level 6 1600-2799 = level 7 2800-5600 = level 8 5600-11199 = level 9 11200-22399 = level 10 22400-44799 = level 11 44800-89599 = level 12 89600-179199 = level 13 179200-358399 = level 14 358400-716799 = level 15 716800-1433599 = level 16 1433600-2867199 = level 17 2867200-5734399 = level 18 5734400-11468799 = level 19 11468800+ = level 20
Class HQs
There are 3 classes: Army Special Operations Civilian resistance
each has its own hq Spec ops hq: 45% Army HQ: 0% Civilian resistance HQ: 0%

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse BETA
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“nicks, post:6, topic:372322”]ha saw something like this released a while back is this that source just updating it with more features, i was going to take it and do something like this but i got lazy also are u going to release this once you are done? i would like to play around on this let me know.

scratch most of the crap i just wrote lol i just went and read everything. answers about all my questions.
gl might apply later.[/quote]
probably wont release it, besides, im still workin on it :o
however it is in beta phase and it is public.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse BETA
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

zombie apocalypse
not your average server…
zombies
guns
mayhem…
Ak47 and variants… lr300 and variants… dragunov and variants…mp5 and variants… colt 45 and variants… uzi and variants… desert eagle… tazer, MG42, A FLAMETHROWER!! Soon to be:grenade, airstrike.


put these in forum sigs etc, anywere possible!
here are the codes:

Images thanks to Javafire
Website at:
[size=36pt]http://zapocalypse.x10.mx/[/size]
Register, and find the client download for the beta!
[size=36pt]http://zapocalypse.x10.mx/index.php?topic=5.0[/size]
Official Client Download Thread ^^^^^

First off…
[size=36pt]this is completely based off Tatemo’s Zombiescape.[/size]
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,378544.0.html
YES I HAVE PERMISSION FROM HIM TO START A DEV TEAM OFF THIS!

POSITIONS!
Owner
Jrubrkletern (me)
Administrators
Carsten9
open
Moderators
open
open
Open
Modeler(nothing big, very basic weapons w/color, and basic zombies)
Reyx7
Coder
PLayRooney

(Please note that all people on the team will have an moderator spot, unless you are a beta tester, if you just applied for moderator, then thats all you would do!)

Application format:
Name:
Age:
Spot of interest:
Why do you think you deserve this position?(If going for modeler, give me a sample of your work)
How long have you been doing this position?
Would you be dedicated?
Some changes i have made…
added over 10 new zombie enemies fully coded (meaning hp, drops, damage, aggression, etc.)
Zombie Headquarters (5 stages, 1 with a if you will, maze)
Added over 100 more zombies (now they are in ardounge, camelot, more in falador, more in draynor, and more in lumbridge!) more spawns to come.
THE ZOMBIE KNOWLEDGE DATABASE!
Name:Zombie Lvl:15 Max hit:1 Aggressive? No Zombie Points for killing: 5 Hitpoints:45

Name:Zombie Lvl:38 Max hit:3 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:7 Hitpoints:95

Name:Zombie Lvl:58 Max hit:4 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:8 Hitpoints:115

Name:Zombie Lvl:78 Max hit:5 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:135

Name:Zombie Lvl:89 Max hit:6 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:165

Name:Zombie Lvl:98 Max hit:8 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:11 Hitpoints:185

Name:Zombie Lvl:111 Max hit:10 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:12 Hitpoints:225

Name:Zombie Lvl:138 Max hit:11 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:245

Name:Zombie: Lvl:148 Max hit:13 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:275

Name:Zombie Lvl:168 Max hit:15 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:16 Hitpoints:315

Notice how this one is bigger than the others?

Now you may be thinking “Oh, ok, same looks, they just get stronger, anything else?”
as they get stronger, they begin too… “change…”

Name:Zombie Lvl:184 Max hit:18 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:19 Hitpoints:355

Name:Zombie Lvl:201 Max hit:22 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:21 Hitpoints:400

Name:Radiated Zombie Lvl:414 Max hit:25 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:25 Hitpoints:800

Name:Alpha Zombie Lvl:??? Max hit:??? Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:100 Hitpoints:5000-25000 vary

[size=36pt]ZOMBIE HEADQUARTERS[/size]
There are 5 rooms in the hq, each will have a challenge
Room 1 (95% complete)
Room 2 (90% complete)
Room 3 (85% complete)
Room 4 (complete)
Room 5 (Complete)
Video of the beta:


[size=36pt]ZOMBIE LEVELS[/size]
now if you have not noticed already from the zombie pictures, there is a zombie level, no level 15 is not the highest because i have it, but it goes up to level 20, here is the complete table:

0-49 = level 0
50-99 = level 2
100-199 = level 3
200-399 = level 4
400-799 = level 5
800-1599 = level 6
1600-2799 = level 7
2800-5600 = level 8
5600-11199 = level 9
11200-22399 = level 10
22400-44799 = level 11
44800-89599 = level 12
89600-179199 = level 13
179200-358399 = level 14
358400-716799 = level 15
716800-1433599 = level 16
1433600-2867199 = level 17
2867200-5734399 = level 18
5734400-11468799 = level 19
11468800+ = level 20

Class HQs

There are 3 classes:
Army
Special Operations
Civilian resistance

each has its own hq
Spec ops hq: 45%
Army HQ: 0%
Civilian resistance HQ: 0%
